About This Site

Welcome! This site is a demonstration of hosting a static website using AWS S3, CloudFront, and Route 53.
Built by Elliott Hrynacz, it showcases modern cloud hosting, fast global delivery, and secure connections.

Elliott is a cloud enthusiast and web developer passionate about scalable, reliable, and secure web solutions.
